review: A nice way of streaming apps from your phone to your tv but past using your phone there isn't much else you can use it for.  There is almost nothing on the PC that can stream to it unless you use Chrome web browser and it was a little buggy last time I used.  I use it occasionally but it doesn't replace a streaming box for Netflix or Hulu.

review: Everything is good from on-time delivery, easy set-up, wifi performance, to overall experience.I used it to watch Youtube and Netflix only in the past 3 weeks. That's pretty much what I need from this stick.There's one small glitch that it may freeze up after running for a couple of hours if I keep loading different video clips like every 5-10 minutes. There's no problem if I was playing a long clip even for 2-3 hours.When glitch happened, I simply power off then power on the Chromecast and it's good to go again.Given the low low price tag, I give it a five-star even with that small drawback.
